org.phenoscape.obd
Class OBDQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.phenoscape.obd.OBDQuery

public class OBDQuery
extends java.lang.Object

This class interfaces with methods from the OBDAPI, specifically in the Shard class hierarchy, and invokes these methods. Methods defined in this class return their results to invoking REST resources

POSTCOMP_RELATIONS

private static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> POSTCOMP_RELATIONS
Mapping for how to represent relations used in post-comp differentia when generating a human-readable label. If the relation is not in this map, use "of".

executeFreeTextQueryAndAssembleResults

public java.util.Collection<AnnotationDTO> executeFreeTextQueryAndAssembleResults(java.lang.Integer reifLinkId)
                                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Parameters:
reifLinkId - - the search parameter for the SQL query. This is an INTEGER which is provided by the invoking REST service.
Returns:
a collection of DTOs, one for each row returned by the query
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - The purpose of this query is to return all the free text data (metadata) associated with a given assertion The metadata is packaged into a collection of Nodes which are then returned back

executeHomologyQueryAndAssembleResults

public java.util.Collection<HomologDTO> executeHomologyQueryAndAssembleResults(java.lang.String searchTerm)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Parameters:
searchTerm - - the search parameter for the SQL query. This term comes from the REST service
Returns:
a collection of nodes
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - The purpose of this method is to retrieve all the homolog information from the database and package them into a collection of nodes. All the retrieved information is added to these Nodes via links

executeQueryAndAssembleResults

public java.util.Collection<PhenotypeDTO> executeQueryAndAssembleResults(java.lang.String queryStr,
                                                                         java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filterOptions)
                                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
Parameters:
queryStr - - this is provided by the invoking REST service. This is the SQL query to be executed
searchTerm - - the UID (eg: TAO:0000108) to search for. Also provided by the invoking REST service
filterOptions - - the rows retrieved by the query execution are filtered through these values which are provided by the invoking REST service
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - The purpose of this method is to execute the given query with set search term and assemble the results into a makeshift persistence layer. The persistence layer is a collection of Data Transfer Objects. Each row is packaged into a single PhenotypeDTO object. The phenotype is the central entity in this querying procedure. Therefore, the IDs of the each node are set to be the retrieved phenotype. The method assembles these DTOs into a collection, which are returned

isFilterableRow

private boolean isFilterableRow(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filterOptions,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filterableValues)
Parameters:
filterOptions - These are set by the calling method, they come directly from user input
filterableValues - These are the ids present in the various columns of the row that is being checked The purpose of this method is to check a row against the filter values. If the row contains ALL the filter values, ths method returns a false meaning the row is NOT to be filtered.

semanticLabel

public java.lang.String semanticLabel(org.obd.model.Node node)
Return a label for any node in a shard. If the node has no label, a label is generated recursively based on the node's properties as a compositional descripton.

Parameters:
node - The Node for which to return or generate a label.

semanticLabel

public java.lang.String semanticLabel(java.lang.String id)
Return a label for any node in a shard. If the node has no label, a label is generated recursively based on the node's properties as a compositional descripton.

Parameters:
id - The identifier of a Node for which to return or generate a label.

simpleLabel

public java.lang.String simpleLabel(org.obd.model.Node node)
Parameters:
node - - a post composition node
Returns:
- a human readable label generated from the post composition

simpleLabel

public java.lang.String simpleLabel(java.lang.String id)

getAutocompletionsForSearchTerm

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> getAutocompletionsForSearchTerm(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                                                                                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchOptions)
                                                                                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
This method uses the input search term from the form, and the specified search options to first construct an SQL query and then return the autocompletions returned by the query execution as a data structure to the AutoCompleteResource

Parameters:
searchTerm - - the input search term from the form
searchOptions - - the search options specified in the form
Returns:
- a data structure which groups the autocompletions under different categories viz. label match, synonym match and definition match
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

constructAutocompleteQueryFromSearchTermAndSearchOptions

private java.lang.String constructAutocompleteQueryFromSearchTermAndSearchOptions(java.lang.String searchTerm,
                                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchOptions)
This method uses the input search term and input specified search options to construct an SQL query, which will be executed by the executeAutocompletionQueryAndProcessResults(String, List) method

Parameters:
searchTerm - - the input search term (comes from the form)
searchOptions - - search options specified in the form
Returns:
a SQL query string

executeAutocompletionQueryAndProcessResults

private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>> executeAutocompletionQueryAndProcessResults(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> sourceIdList)
                                                                                                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
This query executes the given query and iterates through the returned result set to construct a data structure, which groups each result under one of label match, synonym match or definition match

Parameters:
query - - the SQL query, which is assembled by the constructAutocompleteQueryFromSearchTermAndSearchOptions(String, Map) method
Returns:
- a data structure which groups the autocompletions under different categories viz. label match, synonym match and definition match
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

createSourceIdListFromOntologyOptions

private java.util.List<java.lang.String> createSourceIdListFromOntologyOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> searchOptions)
This method creates a list of source ids from the database given the list of ontologies to be searched

Parameters:
searchOptions - - the search options input from the form. This includes the list of ontologies to be searched
Returns:
a list of source ids for every ontology in the list

isToBeFiltered

private boolean isToBeFiltered(java.lang.String sourceId,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> sourceIdList)
This method decides if a result is to be filtered given the source id. The input source id is compared with the list of source ids of the ontologies whose terms are to be included in the results

Parameters:
sourceId - - the source id of the result
sourceIdList - - the list of source ids corr. to the ontologies whose terms are to be included in the results
Returns:
a boolean to indicate if this result is to be filtered
